name: video-translation-project
description: Sistema de tradução de vídeos do YouTube

scripts.install:backend: if exist .venv\Scripts\pip.exe (.venv\Scripts\pip.exe install -r backend/requirements.txt) else (if exist backend\venv\Scripts\pip.exe (backend\venv\Scripts\pip.exe install -r backend/requirements.txt) else (pip install -r backend/requirements.txt))
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
